course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Community Services Project: The Mobile App Development for Hearing Impaired Children
course.description: This project is aimed to design an mobile App and server system of Articulation Screening and Training Tool for hearing impaired children. In this course, we would like have multidisciplinary students from various schools. Student will work in sub-team in different area such as mobile app design, data server construction, system integration, UI design. They will also organize service learning activities in collecting speech samples. Students must obtain prior approval from course coordinator for enrolling in the course. May be repeated for credits, if different topics are taken. Graded P or F. May be graded PP.
